scripts.docker:error: if [ -z "${npm_config_tag}" ]; then echo "Error: El par√°metro --tag es obligatorio. Ejemplo: npm run docker:<action> --tag=1.0.0"; exit 1; fi
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:error && docker build -f Dockerfile.prod . --build-arg TARGETPLATFORM=linux/amd64 -t bryanstgarcia/cms-strapi:${npm_config_tag}
scripts.docker:latest: npm run docker:error && docker tag bryanstgarcia/cms-strapi:${npm_config_tag} bryanstgarcia/cms-strapi:latest
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:error && docker push bryanstgarcia/cms-strapi:${npm_config_tag} && docker push bryanstgarcia/cms-strapi:latest
scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:error && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:latest && npm run docker:push
